user_query: I want to know the real-time volume, liquidity value, and market capitalization of a cryptocurrency. Can you provide me with the current volume, liquidity value, and market capitalization in US Dollars? Additionally, I need the real-time rates of the cryptocurrency.

TaskList.description: Fetch the real-time volume of the specified cryptocurrency in US Dollars.
Fetch the liquidity value of the specified cryptocurrency in US Dollars.
Fetch the market capitalization of the specified cryptocurrency in US Dollars.
Fetch the real-time rates of the specified cryptocurrency.
